explains: n. 重要事件，转折点；里程碑，里程标

sentences.en: He said the launch of the party represented a milestone in Zambian history.
sentences.cn: 他说该党的成立代表着赞比亚历史上的一个里程碑。

sentences.en: By 2014, that milestone had shifted to age 29.
sentences.cn: 到了2014年，这一里程碑转变为29岁。

sentences.en: In fact, this "milestone" came and went with a whimper for me.
sentences.cn: 实际上，对于我来说，这个“里程碑”夹杂着呜咽声来来去去。
